intro.button: Would you like to know more?

about-me.title: Who am I?
about-me.text: My name is Julius Stammler and I'm a content creator based in Jena, Germany. I do professional photo shoots, advertising campaigns and videos at events.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.text: Learn more about my recent projects:

card1.name: Biathlon Olympics
card1.text: I covered the Biathlon Olympics in Oberhof, Thuringia in the year 2022/2023. This was my first big project working alongside a professional TV production team.

card2.name: Berlin Thunders
card2.text: I filmed several American football games for the German football team Berlin Thunders, setting up multiple cameras to capture all the plays from different angles.

card3.name: FPV Drone
card3.text: I produced an unboxing video of the new DJI FPV Drone. This project taught me how to present and promote products.

card4.name: FPV Drone
card4.text: I produced an unboxing video of the new DJI FPV Drone. This project taught me how to present and promote products.

card1.name: Julius Stammler
